titles.title: Preserving Telehealth, Hospital, and Ambulance Access Act
Preserving Telehealth, Hospital, and Ambulance Access Act
Preserving Telehealth, Hospital, and Ambulance Access Act
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to extend certain flexibilities and payment adjustments under the Medicare program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 41 - 0.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Ways and Means. H. Rept. 118-891, Part I.
House Committee on Energy and Commerce Granted an extension for further consideration ending not later than Dec. 19, 2024.
Committee on Energy and Commerce discharged.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 786.

committee.name: House Ways and Means
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

term.name: Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation
